ovdesc.p: Holds Tokens of users currently logged in to T24

desc.p: The status of the Token. Set to ONLINE as the user is active.
The field holds the operator id for whom the record is created.
This field holds the time when the token record is created.
This field holds the date on which the token is created.
This field holds the company in which the user has logged in.
This field holds the id of the external user when the user logged in is an External user.
This is the code by which a record in this application can be identified. The id is a unique time allocated when creating the record.
